mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_items (user_id, product_id, quantity) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE quantity = quantity + #{quantity}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, p.name as product_name, p.price as product_price, p.image_url as product_image FROM cart_items c JOIN products p ON c.product_id = p.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC

SELECT c.*, p.name as product_name, p.price as product_price, p.image_url as product_image FROM cart_items c JOIN products p ON c.product_id = p.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.product_id = #{productId}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart_items SET quantity = #{quantity}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart_items WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
